lead_paragraph: Nearly four months after giving birth, Lisa Leslie is back on the court with the United States women’s national team for its eight-team college tour beginning tomorrow night against Maryland. Leslie, who gave birth to Lauren Jolie Lockwood on June 25, sat out the W.N.B.A. season while she was pregnant. Leslie, the W.N.B.A. most valuable player in 2006, won gold medals with the national team in the 1996, 2000 and 2004 Olympics.
